market_summary: XRP down 0.56% to $1.42 amid extreme fear (F&G: 9). Volume remains healthy at $1.4B. Macro stress elevated with USD/JPY at 155.21 and JGB yields at 2.24%.
thesis_pulse: Institutional adoption metrics continue tracking toward targets despite market fear. RLUSD circulation at $1.56B (31% of $5B target) shows steady growth. XRP ETF AUM at $1.5B (30% of target) remains on trajectory. Critical data gaps persist for ODL volume and permissioned DEX adoption. Macro stress elevated but not critical, with USD/JPY at threshold level.

stress_assessment.interpretation: Multiple stress indicators elevated: USD/JPY at 155.21 (threshold level), JGB yields at 2.24% (above critical 2%), extreme market fear at 9. Oil at $69.77 remains manageable but geopolitical tensions high.

alerts.message: USD/JPY at 155.21 - at elevated stress threshold, monitor for breakthrough above 155
JGB 10Y yield at 2.24% - above critical threshold of 2%, indicating Japanese monetary stress
Fear & Greed index at 9 (Extreme Fear) - potential contrarian opportunity but monitor for capitulation
Manual data stale since Feb 18 - ODL volume and permissioned DEX metrics unavailable for 4 days

etf_analysis: ETF data unavailable for current analysis. Manual update shows $1.5B AUM, tracking 30% toward $5B target.
macro_analysis: Elevated stress environment with USD/JPY at threshold and JGB yields in critical territory above 2%. Oil manageable at $69.77 but geopolitical risks remain high.
